Federal Register: 248. Thiobencarb (carbamic acid, diethylthio-, s-(p-chlorobenzyl)) (CAS No. 028249-77-6) (FIFRA AI) (Ref. 3). Measured aquatic acute toxicity values for thiobencarb include a chinook salmon 96-hour LC sub 50 of 760 ppb, a striped bass 96-hour LC sub 50 of 760 ppb, a rainbow trout 96-hour LC sub 50 of 790 ppb, and a green algae 72-hour EC sub 50 of 30 ppb (population reduction). EPA believes that there is sufficient evidence for listing thiobencarb on EPCRA section 313 pursuant to EPCRA section 313(d)(2)(C) based on the available environmental toxicity data.
